Half Life eski 1990 ların en iyi grafikli oyunuydu o zaman oynamakla şimdi oynamakla fark var ama oyunu biraz anlatıyım:

Öncelikle oyunda altyazı yok. Altyazı eklemek için internetten mod indirmeniz lazım. Grafikler ise dediğim gibi eskiler için efsane olsada şuan kötü ama grafiklerle çok ilgili iseniz Black Mesa'yı alabilirsiniz Steamden. Atmosferide gayet iyi olduğunu düşünüyorum.

Hikayeye geçersek şöyle anlatayım:
Adımız Gordon Freeman bir bilim insanıyız ve bi proje üzerinde çalışırken makine patlar ve çoğu şey mutant olur bizde bunu sonlardırmak amacıyla bi maceraya atılırız. Şunu da söylemeden geçmiyim bu oyun FPS oyunlarında hikaye olabileceğini gösteren ilk oyundur.
This is my "Halfe-Life" i play that on Ps2 and i love it

I heard a lot of good things about this game, so I tried it out and I did not enjoy it.

First of all there are a few alternate paths here and there, but the game only rewards you with a little bit of ammo that you had to waste to get there anyways, so it doesn't feel rewarding at all and you stop caring about alternate paths.

Next, there are a bunch of different weapons, which is nice, but for some weapons you can barely carry any ammo, so don't really get to use them and some are only occasionally useful, so you will only end up using just a few of them mostly depending on ammo count.

There also isn't any great variety in the game. There will be new enemies in new areas, but you will still end up shooting at the same enemies at least 100 times.
A few areas are cool, but then they are so short that they quickly die out in the vastness of boring linear level design that is the entire rest of the game.
The story isn't good either and as there is almost no progression it stays dull.

The controls are also flawed as there is auto aim ( fuck that crap ) and jumping mechanics are also incredibly static, so just jumping up a ledge is a pain in the ass.
The game also introduces a cool item, which is the long jump module, too bad you only get the one cool feature that could make the game at least somewhat interesting incredibly late.

All in all. It might have been good in the past, but it's probably so outdated that even CoD is more enjoyable than this and no I'm not a fucking CoD fanboy.

Un CLASICO.
Hoy puede no ser el mejor juego del mundo, en el terreno grafico y sonoro ha envejecido realmente mal, y la jugabilidad, pese a funcionar, no es perfecta, su historia tampoco...
Pero, este juego es de 1998, un juego que supuso un antes y un después en el mundo del videojuego y sobre todo en el terreno de los first-person shooter.

Así que... ¿Lo recomiendo?
Sí, por supuesto. Pero concretaré un detalle.
...
- Si quieres jugar una obra importante y necesaria para entender el videojuego: adelante. Es completamente disfrutable y divertido.
- Pero, si quieres jugar a este juego y a la vez esquivar todos esos "inconvenientes" que el tiempo ha creado en esta obra, JUGAD A BLACK MESA. Es un remake de este juego. (Yo no lo he jugado, pero tengo entendido que respeta la obra original, asi que por narices debe ser bueno)

Классика жанра, которая взорвала игровою индустрию тех годов. Пропродитель наших любымих шутеров и многое другое.
Все это Half-Life, а сейчас Valve ленивые чмыри

Yapımcı VALVE'nin en efsanevi ve ilk çıkan oyunda pek fazla bilgim yok. Bu oyunu oynamanın nedeni tanıdığımız Cantuğ Özsoy yani bildiğimiz UNLOST'tan ilhamı veriyor olmasıydı. Bu oyuna girince herşey güzel. Düşük sistemli bilgisayarda aklınıza gelen ilk oyun bu olsun. Özellikle İnternet Cafe'deki ortam bulunması. En iyi VALVE'nin yaptığı bir efsanevi bir oyun hiç kaçırmayın alın işte ;)

VALVe's first major hit, and the game that got the company off the ground. Without this game you would not have Half-life 2, Team Fortress 2, all of the Counter Strikes, Dota 2, the source engine and all mods and standalone games made for it, or the left 4 dead games. Steam may not even exist if this game never came out

Half Life and Half Life 2 are the best games ever made, period.  They're perfect.  It'd be nice if they'd make a third one, but I doubt it'll ever happen, which doesn't make sense because they'd make millions of dollars.

I can see why this game might've been good back in the late 90's but this game sucks now.

Not even talking about the graphics, the enemies are annoying rather than challenging (those jumping enemies piss me off more than they should).
Ladders are clunky af, it especially shows when you have to evade the 3-headed GodKnowsWhatTheFuckItIs.

Guns are clunky, there are only like, 3 voice actors, there is 1 guard skin, 3 scientist skins, and only about 2 voice actors for all of the characters. Trip wire bombs are placed so that you'll need to reload saves from dieing because there's no way you'd know they'd be there in the first place. Oh yea, and sentry guns are about as autistic as fidget spinners.

"b-but, it was made in 1998". Yea, but if you want to play this game now, it sucks. HL is simply not worth $10. This should be one of the bargain bin $1 games.

Anyway, guess I'll await all of the downvotes on this review. :)

Half-Life çıkalı neredeyse 20 yıl olmak üzere ama hala daha çoğumuz arkadaşlarıyla oturup şu oyunu oynarken deli gibi eğlenebiliriz. Bunu başarabilen bu kadar eski başka bir oyun gerçekten aklıma gelmiyor. Durum buyken oturup ciddi ciddi Half-Life incelemesi yapmanın da manası yok diyebiliriz.

Bu oyun zaten her yönüyle FPS'nin temelini oluşturmuş. Hikaye desen sonra gelen birçok oyuna ilham vermiş. Teknik olarak da fazla bir problemi yok, günümüz sistemlerinde gayet iyi çalışıyor. Daha ne olsun. Onca senenin hatrına Steam'den almazsam kendimi kötü hissederdim. Almışken de bitirmiş oldum. Gayet güzel nostalji oldu.

Biraz nostalji yaşamak isteyen herkese tavsiye ederim.

 Source版との違いは、日本語modが2017/5/16現在久しぶりに遊んでみたら動いたところでしょう。
 Source版は、UIや一部は日本語なんですが、会話やらは表示されないため、ストーリーがさっぱりわかりません。
テクスチャはどっちもしょっぱかったので、ストーリーが楽しみたいならこちらをどうぞ。
ストーリーなんてどうでもいいやっていう方は、ハーフライフ2や、ブラックメサ（2017/5現在未完）をどうぞ。

最後に、会話などわからなくても目標はわかるから何とかなるサーと思っていましたが、ブツブツ呟く声を認識できるということが、どれだけ素晴らしいことか実感しました。
mod制作者のかた、ありがとうございます。

когда пошел учиться на сварщика но какого-то фига попал в Черную Мезу.

Наконец-то у меня дошли руки пройти эту игру. Да, за почти 20 лет существования Half-Life, я так ни разу в неё и не играл.

Очень понравилось, но в контексте современности некоторые элементы смотрятся странно, даже устаревшими, но тем не менее. 

В первую очередь хочу отметить, что это игра о геймплейном разнообразии. Большое количество оружия, врагов, игровых ситуаций. Авторы ловко жонглируют всем, что они создали. Экшн сцены сменяются головоломками, головоломки - прыжковыми упражнениями по висящими над пропастью ящиками, затем ты едешь на вагонетке, плаваешь в затопленных помещениях, сражаешься с невидимками и тд. Элементы геймплея меняются, комбинируются и не дают скучать. Условия  преображаются и приходится адаптироваться под новые правила. И это всё действительно классно и гармонично работает, я не могу припомнить подобного разнообразия, построенного по сути на одной механике, ни в одной игре. Это действительно шедеврально сделано.

К сожалению, под конец игры концепция меняющегося геймплея доходит до абсолюта в виде мира Зен. Совершенно другие условия слегка отпугнули меня и потребовалось время, чтоб допройти до конца. Но это мелочь, скорее некий субъективизм.

Остальные же элементы уже выгляд более устаревшими и спорными. Графика очевидно режет глаза, но я спустя минут 15 привык. Так и не понял, как работает музыка, большую часть времени мы бегаем в тишине, лишь иногда включаются некоторые треки. Звуки проработаны хорошо, но ничего особеннного. То же можно сказать и про сюжет: ничего особенного. Он тут для такого жанра неплох, но восторга не вызывает.

Проходил сразу на максимальной сложности, всё достаточно сбалансированно. В итоге получается не лёгкая пробежка, но и умирать по 50 раз на одном месте не придётся, приходится быть внимательным и сконцентрированным.

Нарвался на пару багов, когда Гордон, посещая угол, просто там застревает и не хочет никуда идти. Наверное, какая-нибудь психологическая травма из детства)

Подводя итоги: шедевр своего времени и сейчас смотрится и играется неплохо. Но советовать его всем не могу, слишком большой возраст у игры, не все, так скажем, смогут адаптироваться под изменившиеся условия) Но кто сможет, тот будет вознагражден великоленым геймплеем.

Без сомнения добавляю в "Избранное")
It gud

Looking for nostalgia and, possibly, a challenge (in comparison to HL2 anyway)? 

Here you go. While HL2 gives you brain fodder, this game is unforgiving when sending enemies at you. Almost dying? Well here's a deal, I'll shove 10-15 headcrabs and zombies at you, and you'll kill them? Sounds like a good deal? No? Well screw you, good luck! 

But that's not a bad thing. Challenge is good, and that is exactly what you get here. Not to say that there isn't any brain fodder - because there is! There are indeed mind-boggling puzzles. So your brain will also get trained! 

Good game, definitely!

Another "classic" old game that I never played in it's time. I can see what all the fuss was about. I'm impressed that in spite of how well known this game is it turns out no one really talks about the plot at all. Through pop cultural osmosis I thought this game was about a sort of zombie outbreak due to the head crabs but that only really describes the first level or so after the accident. All the dimensional Doom-style demon world travel came as a surprise to me.

Un juego que marco una nueva era.

GOD GAME

Sure this game may look old, but it is still fun to play.

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]
+No hand holding - seriously, this game won't tell you what to do, which can be great
+fun encounters - most enemy encounters in the game have been designed really well, with great varieties
+different sections - From fighting in the labs, to riding train-carts, to underwater and even SPAAAACE!
+Music - when it is used, it makes the gameplay more hectic and fun

[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b]
-walking - you slide everywhere quite quickly, which makes platforming fairly difficult at times
-Last boss - [spoiler]yeah this wasn't fun. Getting teleported to places where enemies are really high and you are stuck on tiny platforms with increased gravity with the terrible platforming? no thanks[/spoiler]
-Bulletsponge enemies - this is pretty annoying, especially when the assualt rifle is terrible at shooting

[b][u]Overall Score:[/u][/b] 8/10
